scripts.postinstall: concurrently -n dev1,dev2,dev3,dev4 "npm --prefix dev1/client install" "npm --prefix dev2/client install" "npm --prefix dev3/client install" "npm --prefix dev4/client install"
scripts.build: concurrently -n dev1,dev2,dev3,dev4 "npm --prefix dev1/client run build" "npm --prefix dev2/client run build" "npm --prefix dev3/client run build" "npm --prefix dev4/client run build"
